        serializers - Adapters for serialization.

        Parameters:
        in - JSON string input.
        Returns:

      • getInnerJSONObjectObject

        public com.google.gson.JsonObject getInnerJSONObjectObject(com.google.gson.JsonObject json,
                                                  String jsonPath)
        Parameters:
        json - JSON object.
        jsonPath - Successive path of JSON to fetch e.g. e.f.v.ri
        Returns:
        Inner JSON object. Null is returned if any key doesn't exist. Null is returned if at any the element is an array and not an object. Null is returned if the last key doesn't represent an object.
